scripts.chore:pr: git add . && git commit -m '[chore] updates changelog' --no-verify && git push origin chore-changelog -f
scripts.chore: npm run chore:delete-branch && npm run chore:branch && npm run chore:changelog && npm run chore:pr
scripts.postpublish: git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin --tags && npm run chore
scripts.test: npm run markdownlint && npm run grammar && npm run spelling
scripts.test:ci: npm run markdownlint && npm run grammar && npm run spelling:ci
